solution_line_template: Anna needs {slices_per_sandwich} x {num_sandwiches} = <<{slices_per_sandwich}*{num_sandwiches}={total_needed}>>{total_needed} slices of ham to make 50 sandwiches.
Anna needs {total_needed} - {slices_on_hand} = <<{total_needed}-{slices_on_hand}={more_needed}>>{more_needed} more slices of ham
